job_title: Technical Project Manager with .Net & Finance domain exp.
jd: Greetings! I am Pavan Kumar, reaching out to check your availability. Please review the job description below and submit your latest resume if you are looking for new opportunities. Also, if someone else in your network is qualified for the position, then please feel free to forward this mail to them. Job Title : Technical Project Manager with .Net & Finance domain exp.Location : Phoenix AZ - Onsite from day1 - Locals PreferredDuration : Long Term Contract Job Description: Mandatory Skill set: Project Management, Product Management, GRCT, Finance domain (Risk and Compliance), .NET, TPM, Regression & Performance Testing, MS SQLLooking for an experienced technical project manager that can hit the ground running as part of the Global Sanctions Risk and Compliance team in GRCT. The candidate must be experience of managing the distributed applications especially .NET/API's and be a team contribute candidate will be expected to complete document and co-ordinate with multiple technology teams, product, business and ensure the delivery schedule. They will be part of an end-to-end team and may have to participate in RFC's, tracking application deployment, and tracking proc issues with the components they deliver. Candidate should be an excellent communicator and willing to speak up to contribute and participial meetings and Agile ceremonies.
